posts.post_content:
#1 - Demmit (NY)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/47874/demmitt-ny[/IMG]

#2 - Donlin (Fielding)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/37439/donlin-fielding[/IMG]

#3 - Krause (Portrait)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/53811/krause-portrait[/IMG]

3 times X = a fair price for these three cards.

Name your own X for 1, 2 or all three cards.

Your offer may or may not include shipping.

Offers will be decided upon expeditiously, but if a higher offer follows yours, you will be given the opportunity to match it, before it is accepted.

Just for grins :):):):):):D

Let's say X=$37 for all three including shipping.

N.B. - $37 is not the price of all three cards.
          Please refer to the equation in the original post.
